question: What kinds of actions can lead to justice?

quotes.text: When Indians gave their word and smoked the pipe, they sent the smoke to the Creator. It was sacred, and the treaty was good in the eyes of all. The white men had to go back and ask other white men if they could keep their promises and make good on their word.
quotes.source: Vine Deloria Jr., quoted in the introduction to Nation to Nation: Treaties Between the United States and American Indian Nations, ed. Suzan Shown Harjo (Washington, D.C. and New York: Smithsonian Institution, 2014), 3
